sections.heading: officers; appointment as deputy prohibited
sections.text: The Auditor of Public Accounts, State Treasurer, and State Librarian cannot appoint any of the others his or her deputy.SourceR.S.1866, c. 15, § 3, p. 127;R.S.1913, § 5737;C.S.1922, § 5066;C.S.1929, § 84-803;R.S.1943, § 84-803;Laws 1990, LB 821, § 54.

84-803.State officers; appointment as deputy prohibited.

The Auditor of Public Accounts, State Treasurer, and State Librarian cannot appoint any of the others his or her deputy.

SourceR.S.1866, c. 15, § 3, p. 127;R.S.1913, § 5737;C.S.1922, § 5066;C.S.1929, § 84-803;R.S.1943, § 84-803;Laws 1990, LB 821, § 54.
